name: Heat Death(Game Jam April 2019)
description:
You're a fast and evil ball monster that wants to cause the heat death of the universe by killing the sun.

controls:
left and right arrow keys to move left and right
mouse click to attack/jump

credits:

Myself - player code, sun boss battle, ships, and  platform animations, music and sound implementation

David - Additional player code, robot axe swingers, colider physics 

Gunnar - Art assets, sound design 

Cameron - Additional art assets 

Music: copyright free 8-bit adventure music which was not created by the four of us.
